testcase.name: Successful login with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User launch browser...................................................passed And opens URL "http://localhost/opencart/upload/index.php"..................passed When User navigates to MyAccount menu.......................................passed And click on Login..........................................................passed And User enters email as "priyankshah@gmail.com" and password as "test@123".passed And click on Login button...................................................passed Then User navigates to MyAccount page.......................................passed And User navigates to MyAccount menu........................................passed And click on Logout.........................................................passed
